verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> now שְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> Yet now hear יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> O Jacob עַבְדִּ֑י <WH5650> my servant וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and Israel בָּחַ֥רְתִּי <WH977> whom I have chosen בֽוֹ׃

כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD עֹשֶׂ֛ךָ <WH6213> that made וְיֹצֶרְךָ֥ <WH3335> thee and formed מִבֶּ֖טֶן <WH990> thee from the womb יַעְזְרֶ֑ךָּ <WH5826> [which] will help אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָא֙ <WH3372> thee Fear עַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> my servant יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> not O Jacob וִישֻׁר֖וּן <WH3484> and thou Jesurun בָּחַ֥רְתִּי <WH977> whom I have chosen בֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֶצָּק־ <WH3332> For I will pour מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> water עַל־ <WH5921> on צָמֵ֔א <WH6771> upon him that is thirsty וְנֹזְלִ֖ים <WH5140> and floods עַל־ <WH5921> on יַבָּשָׁ֑ה <WH3004> upon the dry ground אֶצֹּ֤ק <WH3332> I will pour רוּחִי֙ <WH7307> my spirit עַל־ <WH5921> upon זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <WH2233> upon thy seed וּבִרְכָתִ֖י <WH1293> and my blessing עַל־ <WH5921> on צֶאֱצָאֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6631> upon thine offspring

וְצָמְח֖וּ <WH6779> And they shall spring up בְּבֵ֣ין <WH996> [as] among חָצִ֑יר <WH2682> the grass כַּעֲרָבִ֖ים <WH6155> as willows עַל־ <WH5921> by יִבְלֵי־ <WH2988> courses מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> by the water

זֶ֤ה <WH2088> This יֹאמַר֙ <WH559> One shall say לַֽיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD'S אָ֔נִי <WH589> I וְזֶ֖ה <WH2088> one יִקְרָ֣א <WH7121> and another shall call בְשֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> [himself] by the name יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְזֶ֗ה <WH2088> and another יִכְתֹּ֤ב <WH3789> and another shall subscribe יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> [with] his hand לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וּבְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> [himself] by the name יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel יְכַנֶּֽה׃ <WH3655> and surname פ

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the King יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel וְגֹאֲל֖וֹ <WH1350> and his redeemer יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I am רִאשׁוֹן֙ <WH7223> I [am] the first וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> and I אַחֲר֔וֹן <WH314> and I [am] the last וּמִבַּלְעָדַ֖י <WH1107> and beside אֵ֥ין <WH369> and there אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> me [there is] no God

וּמִֽי־ <WH4310> Who כָמ֣וֹנִי <WH3644> is like יִקְרָ֗א <WH7121> And who as I shall call וְיַגִּידֶ֤הָ <WH5046> and shall declare וְיַעְרְכֶ֙הָ֙ <WH6186> it and set it in order לִ֔י מִשּׂוּמִ֖י <WH7760> for me since I appointed עַם־ <WH5971> nation עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> the ancient וְאֹתִיּ֛וֹת <WH857> the things וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and תָּבֹ֖אנָה <WH935> and shall come יַגִּ֥ידוּ <WH5046> let them shew לָֽמוֹ׃

אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּפְחֲדוּ֙ <WH6342> Fear וְאַל־ <WH408> nay תִּרְה֔וּ <WH7297> be afraid הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> not מֵאָ֛ז <WH227> thee from that time הִשְׁמַעְתִּ֥יךָ <WH8085> have not I told וְהִגַּ֖דְתִּי <WH5046> and have declared וְאַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> and you עֵדָ֑י <WH5707> [it]? ye [are] even my witnesses הֲיֵ֤שׁ <WH3426> Is there אֱל֙וֹהַּ֙ <WH433> a God מִבַּלְעָדַ֔י <WH1107> beside וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> is there צ֖וּר <WH6697> me? yea [there is] no God בַּל־ <WH1077> lest יָדָֽעְתִּי׃ <WH3045> I know

יֹֽצְרֵי־ <WH3335> They that make פֶ֤סֶל <WH6459> a graven image כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> are all תֹּ֔הוּ <WH8414> [are] all of them vanity וַחֲמוּדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2530> and their delectable things בַּל־ <WH1077> no יוֹעִ֑ילוּ <WH3276> shall not profit וְעֵדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5707> and they [are] their own witnesses הֵׅ֗מָּׅהׅ <WH1992> like בַּל־ <WH1077> fail יִרְא֛וּ <WH7200> they see וּבַל־ <WH1077> fail יֵדְע֖וּ <WH3045> not nor know לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> so יֵבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <WH954> that they may be ashamed
מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יָצַ֥ר <WH3335> Who hath formed אֵ֖ל <WH410> a god וּפֶ֣סֶל <WH6459> a graven image נָסָ֑ךְ <WH5258> or molten לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> to no הוֹעִֽיל׃ <WH3276> [that] is profitable

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֲבֵרָיו֙ <WH2270> Behold all his fellows יֵבֹ֔שׁוּ <WH954> shall be ashamed וְחָרָשִׁ֥ים <WH2796> and the workmen הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> themselves מֵֽאָדָ֑ם <WH120> they [are] of men יִֽתְקַבְּצ֤וּ <WH6908> let them all be gathered together כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> all יַֽעֲמֹ֔דוּ <WH5975> let them stand up יִפְחֲד֖וּ <WH6342> [yet] they shall fear יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <WH954> [and] they shall be ashamed יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> together

חָרַ֤שׁ <WH2796> shapes בַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> iron מַֽעֲצָ֔ד <WH4621> with the tongs וּפָעַל֙ <WH6466> both worketh בַּפֶּחָ֔ם <WH6352> in the coals וּבַמַּקָּב֖וֹת <WH4717> it with hammers יִצְּרֵ֑הוּ <WH3335> and fashioneth וַיִּפְעָלֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH6466> and worketh בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> of his arms כֹּח֔וֹ <WH3581> it with the strength גַּם־ <WH1571> also רָעֵב֙ <WH7456> gets וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> faileth כֹּ֔חַ <WH3581> and his strength לֹא־ <WH3808> no שָׁ֥תָה <WH8354> he drinketh מַ֖יִם <WH4325> no water וַיִּיעָֽף׃ <WH3286> and is faint

חָרַ֣שׁ <WH2790> altogether עֵצִים֮ <WH6086> wood נָ֣טָה <WH5186> stretcheth out קָו֒ <WH6957> [his] rule יְתָאֲרֵ֣הוּ <WH8388> he marketh it out בַשֶּׂ֔רֶד <WH8279> with a line יַעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <WH6213> he fitteth בַּמַּקְצֻע֔וֹת <WH4741> it with planes וּבַמְּחוּגָ֖ה <WH4230> with the compass יְתָאֳרֵ֑הוּ <WH8388> and he marketh it out וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <WH6213> and maketh כְּתַבְנִ֣ית <WH8403> it after the figure אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> of a man כְּתִפְאֶ֥רֶת <WH8597> according to the beauty אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of a man לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> that it may remain בָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> in the house

לִכְרָת־ <WH3772> He heweth him down ל֣וֹ אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> cedars וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> and taketh תִּרְזָה֙ <WH8645> the cypress וְאַלּ֔וֹן <WH437> and the oak וַיְאַמֶּץ־ <WH553> which he strengtheneth ל֖וֹ בַּעֲצֵי־ <WH6086> for himself among the trees יָ֑עַר <WH3293> of the forest נָטַ֥ע <WH5193> he planteth אֹ֖רֶן <WH766> an ash וְגֶ֥שֶׁם <WH1653> and the rain יְגַדֵּֽל׃ <WH1431> doth nourish

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> becomes לְאָדָם֙ <WH120> Then shall it be for a man לְבָעֵ֔ר <WH1197> to burn וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> for he will take מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> of them וַיָּ֔חָם <WH2552> thereof and warm אַף־ <WH637> also יַשִּׂ֖יק <WH5400> himself yea he kindleth וְאָ֣פָה <WH644> [it] and baketh לָ֑חֶם <WH3899> bread אַף־ <WH637> also יִפְעַל־ <WH6466> yea he maketh אֵל֙ <WH410> a god וַיִּשְׁתָּ֔חוּ <WH7812> and worshippeth עָשָׂ֥הוּ <WH6213> [it] he maketh פֶ֖סֶל <WH6459> it a graven image וַיִּסְגָּד־ <WH5456> and falleth down לָֽמוֹ׃

חֶצְיוֹ֙ <WH2677> part שָׂרַ֣ף <WH8313> He burneth בְּמוֹ־ <WH1119> thereof in אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> the fire עַל־ <WH5921> over חֶצְיוֹ֙ <WH2677> with part בָּשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> flesh יֹאכֵ֔ל <WH398> thereof he eateth יִצְלֶ֥ה <WH6740> he roasteth צָלִ֖י <WH6748> roast וְיִשְׂבָּ֑ע <WH7646> and is satisfied אַף־ <WH637> also יָחֹם֙ <WH2552> yea he warmeth וְיֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> [himself] and saith הֶאָ֔ח <WH1889> Aha חַמּוֹתִ֖י <WH2552> I am warm רָאִ֥יתִי <WH7200> I have seen אֽוּר׃ <WH217> the fire

וּשְׁאֵ֣רִית֔וֹ <WH7611> And the residue לְאֵ֥ל <WH410> a god עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> thereof he maketh לְפִסְל֑וֹ <WH6459> [even] his graven image [יִסְגֹּוד־ כ] (יִסְגָּד־ <WH5456> falls ל֤וֹ <WH5456> he falleth down ק) וְיִשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <WH7812> unto it and worshippeth וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <WH6419> [it] and prayeth אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to וְיֹאמַר֙ <WH559> unto it and saith הַצִּילֵ֔נִי <WH5337> Deliver כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֵלִ֖י <WH410> me for thou [art] my god אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> They have not known וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יָבִ֑ינוּ <WH995> nor understood כִּ֣י <WH3588> for טַ֤ח <WH2902> for he hath shut מֵֽרְאוֹת֙ <WH7200> that they cannot see עֵֽינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> their eyes מֵהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <WH7919> that they cannot understand לִבֹּתָֽם׃ <WH3826> [and] their hearts

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> No יָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> And none considereth אֶל־ <WH413> in לִבּ֗וֹ <WH3820> in his heart וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> nor דַ֥עַת <WH1847> neither [is there] knowledge וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תְבוּנָה֮ <WH8394> nor understanding לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> to say חֶצְי֞וֹ <WH2677> part שָׂרַ֣פְתִּי <WH8313> I have burned בְמוֹ־ <WH1119> of it in אֵ֗שׁ <WH784> the fire וְ֠אַף <WH637> and also אָפִ֤יתִי <WH644> yea also I have baked עַל־ <WH5921> over גֶּחָלָיו֙ <WH1513> upon the coals לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> bread אֶצְלֶ֥ה <WH6740> thereof I have roasted בָשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> flesh וְאֹכֵ֑ל <WH398> and eaten וְיִתְרוֹ֙ <WH3499> the residue לְתוֹעֵבָ֣ה <WH8441> an abomination אֶעֱשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> [it] and shall I make לְב֥וּל <WH944> to the stock עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> of wood אֶסְגּֽוֹד׃ <WH5456> fall

רֹעֶ֣ה <WH7462> He feedeth אֵ֔פֶר <WH665> on ashes לֵ֥ב <WH3820> heart הוּתַ֖ל <WH2048> a deceived הִטָּ֑הוּ <WH5186> hath turned him aside וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יַצִּ֤יל <WH5337> that he cannot deliver אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <WH5315> his soul וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יֹאמַ֔ר <WH559> nor say הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> nor שֶׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> [Is there] not a lie בִּימִינִֽי׃ <WH3225> my right ס

זְכָר־ <WH2142> Remember אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> these יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> these O Jacob וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and Israel כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עַבְדִּי־ <WH5650> for thou [art] my servant אָ֑תָּה <WH859> I יְצַרְתִּ֤יךָ <WH3335> I have formed עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> thee thou [art] my servant לִי֙ אַ֔תָּה <WH859> O יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> O Israel לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִנָּשֵֽׁנִי׃ <WH5382> thou shalt not be forgotten

מָחִ֤יתִי <WH4229> I have blotted out כָעָב֙ <WH5645> as a thick cloud פְּשָׁעֶ֔יךָ <WH6588> thy transgressions וְכֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> and as a cloud חַטֹּאותֶ֑יךָ <WH2403> thy sins שׁוּבָ֥ה <WH7725> return אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about כִּ֥י <WH3588> for גְאַלְתִּֽיךָ׃ <WH1350> unto me for I have redeemed

רָנּ֨וּ <WH7442> Sing שָׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> O ye heavens כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> hath done יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God הָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <WH7321> [it] shout תַּחְתִּיּ֣וֹת <WH8482> ye lower parts אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth פִּצְח֤וּ <WH6476> break forth הָרִים֙ <WH2022> ye mountains רִנָּ֔ה <WH7440> into singing יַ֖עַר <WH3293> O forest וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> and every tree בּ֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָאַ֤ל <WH1350> hath redeemed יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob וּבְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> himself in Israel יִתְפָּאָֽר׃ <WH6286> and glorified פ

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD גֹּאֲלֶ֔ךָ <WH1350> thy redeemer וְיֹצֶרְךָ֖ <WH3335> and he that formed מִבָּ֑טֶן <WH990> thee from the womb אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD עֹ֣שֶׂה <WH6213> that maketh כֹּ֔ל <WH3605> of all נֹטֶ֤ה <WH5186> all [things] that stretcheth forth שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> the heavens לְבַדִּ֔י <WH905> Myself רֹקַ֥ע <WH7554> alone that spreadeth abroad הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the earth [מִי <WH4325> waste כ] [אִתִּי כ] (מֵאִתִּֽי׃ <WH854> for ק)

מֵפֵר֙ <WH6565> That frustrateth אֹת֣וֹת <WH226> the tokens בַּדִּ֔ים <WH907> of the liars וְקֹסְמִ֖ים <WH7080> and maketh diviners יְהוֹלֵ֑ל <WH1984> mad מֵשִׁ֧יב <WH7725> that turneth חֲכָמִ֛ים <WH2450> wise אָח֖וֹר <WH268> [men] backward וְדַעְתָּ֥ם <WH1847> and maketh their knowledge יְשַׂכֵּֽל׃ <WH5528> foolish

מֵקִים֙ <WH6965> That confirmeth דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> the word עַבְדּ֔וֹ <WH5650> of his servant וַעֲצַ֥ת <WH6098> the counsel מַלְאָכָ֖יו <WH4397> of his messengers יַשְׁלִ֑ים <WH7999> and performeth הָאֹמֵ֨ר <WH559> that saith לִירוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem תּוּשָׁ֗ב <WH3427> Thou shalt be inhabited וּלְעָרֵ֤י <WH5892> and to the cities יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah תִּבָּנֶ֔ינָה <WH1129> Ye shall be built וְחָרְבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH2723> the decayed places אֲקוֹמֵֽם׃ <WH6965> and I will raise up
הָאֹמֵ֥ר <WH559> That saith לַצּוּלָ֖ה <WH6683> to the deep חֳרָ֑בִי <WH2717> Be dry וְנַהֲרֹתַ֖יִךְ <WH5104> thy rivers אוֹבִֽישׁ׃ <WH3001> and I will dry up
